heading: HR01945
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE DISTRIBUTION OF FOREIGN PUBLISHED BOOKS IN PUBLIC AND PRIVATE ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS AND THE PROLIFERATION OF UNREGISTERED FOREIGN COMPANIES ENGAGED IN THE BUSINESS OF PUBLISHING BOOKS IN THE PHILIPPINES IN VIOLATION OF EXISTING LAWS, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ADDRESSING A THREAT TO THE EDUCATIONAL DEVELOPMENT IN OUR COUNTRY AND TO THE GOVERNMENT'S  REVENUE COLLECTION EFFORTS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
principal-authors: SUANSING, HORACIO JR. P.; SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01945
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE DISTRIBUTION OF FOREIGN PUBLISHED BOOKS IN PUBLIC AND PRIVATE ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOLS AND THE PROLIFERATION OF UNREGISTERED FOREIGN COMPANIES ENGAGED IN THE BUSINESS OF PUBLISHING BOOKS IN THE PHILIPPINES IN VIOLATION OF EXISTING LAWS, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ADDRESSING A THREAT TO THE EDUCATIONAL DEVELOPMENT IN OUR COUNTRY AND TO THE GOVERNMENT'S REVENUE COLLECTION EFFORTS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SUANSING, HORACIO JR. P., SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B.
DATE FILED : 2018-06-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-07-30
